item.description:
If you ride a scooter your first love is riding. And if you're like most scooterists, your second love is talking about riding.

Yeah, it's December and it's cold. The scooter is probably garaged for the winter. Sounds like a great time to talk about the upcoming season, which is only a few months away. Are you working on the scooter over the winter? Are you planning some super rides? Is there a place you would love to go on your scooter with 5-10 (or 20??!) of your scooter friends?

Come share a breakfast and tell us about it. If it makes you feel better, bring your helmet to put on the table, even if you drive the car.
item.name: OK, so it's December and it's cold. So what?
